hero.description: Have questions or need assistance? Our support team is available 24/7 to help you with anything you need.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form and we'll respond promptly
form.successDescription: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

questions.question: How do I book a service?
questions.answer: You can book a service through our app or website by selecting your car, choosing a service, and picking a convenient time slot.

questions.question: Do you provide pickup and drop?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer free pickup and drop service for all major services within city limits.

questions.question: What warranty do you provide?
questions.answer: We provide 1000km or 1 month warranty on all services and spare parts.

questions.question: How can I track my service?
questions.answer: Once your car is picked up, you can track the service status in real-time through your dashboard.

map.title: Find Us
map.subtitle: Visit our head office or any of our 1000+ service centers
